title: Is AI Out of Control? The Hidden Risks of Salesforce's New AgentForce - Clientell
meta_description: Maximize Salesforce AgentForce ROI: Get real metrics, control frameworks, and tips to avoid costly mistakes in AI agent deployment.

small scale intelligentlySo to sum upâWhile Salesforce AgentForce and other AI tools offer exciting opportunities to boost productivity and streamline workflows they also bring important risks Challenges like data privacy potential biases ethical concerns and security gaps mean that businesses need to adopt AI with care The key is to balance the benefits of these advanced tools with safeguards that manage risks By staying vigilant regularly assessing AIâs impact and upholding transparency and ethical standards companies can harness AIâs potential while ensuring its responsible
